knimeNode.name: Histogram
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays data in a histogram view.

intro.p: Displays an histogram view with different viewing options.

The user can change the following properties on the fly:
Aggregation method (count, summary, average)
Number of bins for numerical attributes (incl. empty bars, excl. missing value bar)
The width of the bars
Show empty intervals
Show missing value bar
Zooming
...
The bars are colored by the number of rows per color attribute.
To allow the work with huge data sets the user has to specify the desired x and aggregation column before opening the view. For more interaction use the "Interactive Histogram" node.

ports.dataIn: The data table that should be displayed.
